text: Ara talakaprapta narira nijedera pratiksaya rakhabe tina rtukala. Ara tadera sbamidera adhikatara hak ache tadera itimadhye phiriye nebara, yadi tara mitamata karate caya. Ara stridera temana adhikara ache yemana ache tadera upare n'yayasangatabhabe.
